Support & Contact

Need help? Our team offers friendly, responsive, and reliable support to ensure you have a smooth experience with the GXON Laravel template.
  • Email: layoutdrop.themes@gmail.com
  • Response Time: Within 24–48 hours on business days (Monday–Friday)
  • Support Includes: Bug fixes, minor customization guidance, and usage questions.
  • Support Excludes: Major custom development, third-party plugin issues, or template modifications beyond the original design.

If you have any suggestions or feature requests, feel free to reach out — we’d love to hear from you!
